trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>는 형식이나 어셈블리에서 XSD 스키마를 생성하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>를 사용하여 스키마 문서에서 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 코드를 생성할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 스키마, 가져오기 및 내보내기 참조 [스키마 가져오기 및 내보내기](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) 및 [클래스에서 스키마 내보내기](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 속성은 개체 그래프에서 읽을 수 있는 형식을 포함하기 위해 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>에서 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 데이터 계약 및 알려진된 형식 참조 [데이터 계약 알려진 형식을](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)합니다.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 데이터 계약 참조 [를 사용 하 여 데이터 계약](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type (`Possessions`) to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들고 `Possessions` 속성에서 반환한 컬렉션에 형식(<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>)을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> then exports the schemas of the types, including the `Possessions` type added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>는 컬렉션에 추가된 `Possessions` 형식을 포함하여 형식의 스키마를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> class.
Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
An implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 특정 형식에 대해 XML 스키마 표현을 내보내는 방법을 사용자 지정하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> 인터페이스의 구현입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: serialization 또는 deserialization 중에 발견할 수 있는 형식의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="KnownTypes" /> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: serialization 또는 deserialization 중에 발견할 수 있는 형식을 포함하는 <see langword="KnownTypes" /> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />는 이 컬렉션에서 지정된 모든 형식의 XML 스키마 표현을 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 속성은 개체 그래프에서 읽을 수 있는 형식(<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 속성을 사용하여 설정)을 포함하기 위해 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>에서 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 데이터 계약 및 알려진된 형식 참조 [데이터 계약 알려진 형식을](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들고 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> 속성에서 반환한 컬렉션에 형식을 추가합니다.
